project.description:
Build a small VM from SVN. Build without:
  • floats
  • cldc1.1
  • imp
  • debugging

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.6.0/jre/lib/i386/client:/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.6.0/jre/lib/i386:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH cd trunk java -jar build.jar clean java -jar build.jar copyphoneme java -jar build.jar -DFLOATS=false -DCLDC1.1=false -DFLASH_MEMORY=false -DENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING=false -DNATIVE_VERIFICATION=false -DNATIVE_GC_ONLY=false -DVM2C=false -DGC=com.sun.squawk.Lisp2Collector java -jar build.jar -DFLOATS=false -DCLDC1.1=false -DFLASH_MEMORY=false -DENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING=false -DNATIVE_VERIFICATION=false -DNATIVE_GC_ONLY=false -DVM2C=false -DGC=com.sun.squawk.Lisp2Collector -prod -mac -o2 rom -strip:a cldc ./squawk -h ./squawk -version
ls -l > sizereport.txt $HUDSON_HOME/bin/runsmoketest.sh DELEGATING
